---
title: "Last 48 Hours of Sequim Weather"
output: flexdashboard::flex_dashboard
runtime: shiny
---

```{r global, include=FALSE}
# load data in 'global' chunk so it can be shared by all users of the dashboard
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
source("utils.R")
```

Inputs {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
# Get the data 
df <- getData()

# Create a selector
weather_vars <- c( "UV", "Humidity", "Temperature", "Pressure", "Precip")

selectInput(inputId = "variable",
            label = h4("Choose Variable to Plot"),
            choices = c("Temperature", "Precip"),
            selected = "Temperature")

# Reactive data based on selector input
datasetInput <- reactive({
  select(df, 
         input$variable,
         Time)
})
```

Row {data-height=800}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}

dataPlot <- reactive({
  getPlot( df, input$variable )
})

renderPlot({
  dataPlot()
})
```
